topic.title: Speed Up Oxygen XML Web Author Customization (use Web Author Test Server Add-on)

body.p: Are you working on any of these tasks:

li.p: Starting a new Oxygen XML Web Author customization project?
Testing if an existing Oxygen XML Editor framework works with Web Author?
Making quick updates to a framework already used in a production Web Author server?

body.p: The Web Author Test Server Add-on is designed to make your work easier and faster.

This Oxygen XML Editor add-on lets you quickly preview and edit XML documents in a local Web Author Test Server. It uses the same framework you are working on. You do not need to package, deploy, or do any extra setup.
Once installed, you'll see a new button in the toolbar, called Start Web Author Server that:

li.p: Launches a local Web Author Test Server automatically.
Opens your current document in it.
